doc.name: DebugListenerTableau
doc.description: A tableau representing a debug listener window. The constructor of this class creates the window. You must then attached any object implementing the Debuggable interface using the setDebuggable() method. Once attached, the window will display any debug messages produced by that object. The listener window itself is an instance of the inner class DebugListenerFrame, which extends TextEditor, and can be accessed using the getFrame() method. As with other tableaux, this is an entity that is contained by an effigy of the model. There can be any number of instances of this class in an effigy.
doc.author: Steve Neuendorffer and Edward A. Lee, Elaine Cheong
